common_0310_rival_01:
Oh yeah—battling can wait. I meant to tell you...\c
Did you know your phone’s map app lets you set
yourself destinations?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0310_rival_02:
You could try setting one of the Gyms as your
destination! That’d get you on your way easy![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0310_friend_01:
Tch! How’s that for a student council president!
Giving your own friends an insider advantage?[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0310_rival_04:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Insider advantage? Sheesh, you make it sound
like we’re cheating or something!\c
All I did was suggest that [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she check out the
Gyms. It’s up to [VAR TRNAME(0000)]\r
whether\r
[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she goes.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0310_friend_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR TRNAME(0000)]’s gonna have h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]iser
hands\r
full\r
searching\r
out\r
Titan\r
Pokémon\r
with me.\c
[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0201)]HShe doesn’t have time to waste on something like
chasing after the Champion Rank.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0310_friend_03:
Me and h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]imer are gonna be too busy visiting the
lairs of Titans and nabbing their Herba Mystica![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0310_rival_05:
En serio? Don’t go filling h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]iser head with
weird stories![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0310_friend_04:
Hey! All I did was invite h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]imer along. It’s still up to
[VAR TRNAME(0000)] whether [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she goes, right?[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0310_botan_02:
It’s about Operation Starfall. Remember what
I told you before?[VAR 0114(0009)]
common_0310_botan_03:
Team Star is made up of five individual squads.
And each one’s got their own base.[VAR 0114(0009)]
common_0310_botan_04:
I need you to go to each base—all five of ’em—
and beat the squad boss there.[VAR 0114(0009)]
common_0310_botan_05:
Team Star’s grunts might try to get in your way,
but I’ll be helping you out...from a distance.[VAR 0114(0009)]
common_0310_botan_06:
And heads-up that the bosses each specialize in
a different Pokémon type. Just remember the\r
names of their crews, and you’ll figure it out.\c
Still, no need to worry. With your skills, I’m sure
you’re more than up to the task.[VAR 0114(0009)]
common_0310_botan_07:
I’ll just go ahead and add the bases’ locations to
your phone for you.[VAR 0114(0009)]
common_0310_botan_08:
Good luck with those bosses. I’ll hook you up
with some nice rewards every time you beat one.[VAR 0114(0009)]
common_0310_rival_07:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Wait one second! Who are you supposed to be?!
And Team Star—those punks are a serious hazard!\r
They’re not [VAR TRNAME(0000)]’s\r
problem![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0310_friend_06:
That’s right! Because [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she’s got more important
things to do, like searching out awesome\r
ingredients with me![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0310_botan_09:
[VAR BD06(0000)]I thought it was up to [VAR TRNAME(0000)]
to\r
decide\r
whether\r
[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she\r
goes\r
or not...\r
Wasn’t\r
that\r
what\r
you\r
said,\r
Nemona?\r
And Arven?[VAR 0114(0009)]
common_0310_botan_10:
I’m looking forward to seeing what you can pull
off, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]. Bye.[VAR 0114(0009)]
common_0310_rival_09:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR TRNAME(0000)]... I’m glad you’re
making\r
plenty\r
of\r
friends\r
here,\r
but\r
try\r
not\r
to\r
get\r
dragged\r
into\r
anything\r
dangerous.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0310_rival_10:
Anyway! No more weird vibes—we’ve got a big
adventure to start![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0310_rival_11:
I’m gonna battle every single Pokémon Trainer
I meet![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0310_rival_12:
If I just keep trying to become the strongest,
I bet that experience will be the thing I treasure![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0310_rival_13:
Guess I’ll start by heading to a Gym and training
up some new Pokémon! Here, I’ll send you a pic\r
of what the Gym buildings look like![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0310_rival_14:
Oh, and...\c
I know we’ve been running our mouths, but it’s
your call what you do, [VAR TRNAME(0000)].\c
Go where you want, and do what it is you really
wanna do the most![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0310_friend_09:
For me, that’s got to be Ma— Er, my big dream
of tracking down the Herba Mystica, that is![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0310_friend_11:
Once we get those herbs, I’ll make you the
absoluuute best sandwich you’ve had in your life![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0310_friend_12: Argh! What’d you come out for?[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0310_rival_16:
Oh my gosh! Did it just come out ’cause you said
“sandwich”? Hahaha![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0310_rival_17:
It seems like it wants to start moving... Is it telling
you to get on, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0310_rival_18:
Whoa, it transformed! Now it REALLY looks like
some kinda weird Cyclizar![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0310_rival_19:
Long as you’ve got [VAR PKNAME(0001)], you can go
pretty much anywhere. Paldea’s your Cloyster![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0310_friend_15:
Well, if you’re going to search for those Titan
Pokémon, I’d say set out from the east gate![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0310_rival_21:
[VAR BD06(0000)]But since [VAR TRNAME(0000)] is ACTUALLY
headed\r
to\r
take\r
on\r
some\r
Gyms,\r
I’d\r
say\r
go\r
for\r
the\r
west gate!\c
Besides, it’s way too easy to get lost out east![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0310_friend_10:
Tch! Man, this is why I can’t get along with you...
I’m out of here! Catch up soon, little buddy![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0310_rival_20:
[VAR BD06(0000)]I’ll head to a Gym. See you around,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(0004)]
